extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade OAS to V20.00.0076 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the latest version of Open Automation Software (OAS) from the official website to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct a thorough impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures to ensure they do not adversely affect operations.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Defensive Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Apply defensive measures to minimize the risk of exploitation, following the guidelines provided by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Review CISA's ICS Security Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Visit the CISA ICS webpage to review recommended practices and strategies for securing industrial control systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Adopt recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as outlined in CISA's resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Observe and monitor for any suspected malicious activity. Follow internal procedures to report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation.
